<p>The GoPro Hero 13 Black action camera <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0FCTS9WMV&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=04598562-b569-4148-b80c-9d6909156167&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=is+down+to+%24310&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAR-hwLtasMFncaDBzt2ZHKoZOK1DKtcQA5U0KktaNCNp&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FGoPro-HERO13-Black-Ecommerce-Packaging%2Fdp%2FB0FCTS9WMV%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/GoPro-HERO13-Black-Ecommerce-Packaging/dp/B0FCTS9WMV/">is down to $310</a> as part of an early Black Friday sale, which is a record low price. That&#39;s a discount of 23 percent or $90.</p> 
<p>This model topped our list of the <a data-i13n="cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/cameras/best-action-camera-130017459.html">best action cameras</a>, and for good reason. It&#39;s a fantastic device with all kinds of <a data-i13n="cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/cameras/gopro-hero-13-black-release-date-price-hands-on-impressions-130027978.html">bells and whistles</a>. It&#39;s the most versatile Hero camera that GoPro has ever made. There&#39;s a new family of modular lenses and it can shoot up to 5.3K and handle 2X optical zoom.</p> <span id="end-legacy-contents"></span>
<p>
 <core-commerce id="673c8c2f288545e98c1d141467dbc005" data-type="product-list" data-original-url="https://www.amazon.com/GoPro-HERO13-Black-Ecommerce-Packaging/dp/B0FCTS9WMV/"></core-commerce></p> 
<p>The battery is bigger than ever before and offers around 90 minutes of continuous shooting in 4K/30FPS. The camera is waterproof up to 10 millimeters, so don&#39;t worry about puddles. The full-color front screen is vivid and makes it easy to review footage without getting a computer involved.</p> 
<p>There&#39;s no internal storage here, but it accepts microSD cards. There&#39;s a camera bundle on sale right now that includes a 64GB microSD, three batteries, a dual charger and a case. That pack <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:GoPro;elmt:;cpos:4;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=06fa1f29-e83c-49e4-81a8-9732450da8a9&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=04598562-b569-4148-b80c-9d6909156167&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=GoPro&amp;linkText=costs+%24349&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAZcF4fVsbAnbK4tb5PhkDE67bYNXzo0VHGz7JOtal009&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fgopro.com%2Fen%2Fus%2Fshop%2Fcameras%2Fbuy%2Fhero13black%2FCHDHX-131-master.html%3Foption-id%3DCHDRB-134-master" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://gopro.com/en/us/shop/cameras/buy/hero13black/CHDHX-131-master.html?option-id=CHDRB-134-master">costs $349</a>, which is a <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:5;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0FKR7PG9W&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=04598562-b569-4148-b80c-9d6909156167&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=discount+of+30+percent&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAXK4qvwikGol9AL10ef1ucaRhR3RAO2pEa7pROuelc9-&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FGoPro-HERO13-Black-Extended-Bundle%2Fdp%2FB0FKR7PG9W%2Fref%3Dast_sto_dp_puis" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/GoPro-HERO13-Black-Extended-Bundle/dp/B0FKR7PG9W/ref=ast_sto_dp_puis?th=1">discount of 30 percent</a>.</p>
